title: Collaborative Nursing Education Curriculum Design: A Faculty-Instructional Designer Partnership Project

context.prior_knowledge: Three or more years of nursing practice experience, understanding of basic nursing theory and skills
context.additional_context: Applies a collaborative model where instructional designers and nursing faculty jointly develop curricula in online/hybrid environments. Utilizes real-time collaboration tools and simulation software in a BYOD setting

learning_goals: Learners can design one or more nursing education modules according to a collaborative process development framework.
Learners plan a process achieving over 80% alignment between learning objectives, assessments, and activities by applying Instructional Systems Design (ISD) principles.
Learners can create hybrid educational materials using digital tools (Learning Management Systems, simulation platforms).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
